title: Drone Attacks Hit Russia for 2nd Straight Day As Ukraine Strikes More Boldly
description: The third apparent drone attack in two days on a Russian air base indicates a new phase of the war for Ukraine as it develops longer-range weapons.

title: NATO Commits To Future Ukraine Membership
link: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will announce substantial U.S. aid for Ukraine’s energy grid.

title: Russian Oil Cap Begins
description: Trying To Pressure Putin Over Ukraine War
column7: Japan and the United States agreed to the measure on Friday.

title: Russia-Ukraine war live: Blinken says US did not ‘enable’ Ukraine strikes inside Russia
description:
US secretary of state says it ‘neither encouraged nor enabled’ drone strikes deep inside Russia that damaged long-range bombers

  • What we know on day 287 of the invasion

More now on Europe’s energy crisis
link:
via AFP:

Sky-high energy prices have caused numerous factories
column5: which was highly dependent upon cheap Russian gas
column6:
to halt operations. But European nations were able to fill their gas reservoirs and no one has been cut off yet.

title: Russian TV station in Latvia loses licence over Ukraine war coverage
description:
TV Rain had relocated from Russia soon after invasion but on-air remarks by presenter were deemed to take Moscow’s side

  • Russia-Ukraine war – latest news updates

Latvia has revoked a broadcast licence for TV Rain
link: the independent Russian TV station broadcasting from exile
column4:
following a scandal over its coverage of the war in Ukraine.

The liberal television station relocated to Riga
column6:
as well as Tbilisi and Amsterdam shortly after Vladimir Putin launched the full-scale invasion of Ukraine.
